content: simple top down stockinette cardigan that let s you get creative with your yarns find an awesome combination of colours that makes you happy this is achieved by starting with two strands of colour a then you will drop one strand of a and replace it with one strand of b after that two strands of colour b and so on there is no striping with this technique and marling creates a softer transition thank you to everyone who helped to test knit this pattern in this thread 1 and on instagram chinese tutorial https //knittinginenglish com/p/le-pouf-cardi-knitting-tutorial chinese translation 2 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/hedgehog-fibres-rocks/3952033/501-525#506 2 https //cdn shopify com/s/files/1/2440/8253/files/lepoufcardi_translation_c pdf v=1629125516
